Title: Relates to the duties of child protective services concerning reports of suspected abuse or maltreatment of children who are members of an active duty military family
Summary: Relates to the duties of child protective services concerning reports of suspected abuse or maltreatment of children who are members of an active duty military family.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the duties of child protective services concerning reports of suspected abuse or maltreatment of children who are members of an active duty military family
